1057730.name: VRAdventure
1057730.description:
VRAdventure is a virtual reality adventure game in huge open world. Intuitive fight system brings a lot of fun while exploring secrets of a world haunted by evil forces.
Play your first VR adventure. Kill monsters, fight enemies and discover secrets of land haunted by evil.
Main features:
- try rich, intuitive VR fight gameplay
- explore huge endless world
- use items, and weapons of diffrent kinds
- experience two modes of VR movement: via teleports and free locomotion
- play real VR adventure game!

This game is intended to be played on HTC Vive. Other VR equipment compatible with SteamVR may work as well, but it's not supported.

VRAdventrue is our first project that is designed exclusively for VR. UI, controls and the scenes are designed to fit best with virtual reality. It's not a port of any PC game and currently there are no plans to make a PC port.

This game was showed for the first time on Digital Dragons 2019 conference.
